dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI odometry dataset provides a benchmark for evaluating visual odometry and SLAM algorithms, featuring various urban driving scenarios captured with a stereo camera and a LiDAR sensor.
dcterms:title: KITTI odometry dataset

dcterms:creator: W. Lu
Y. Zhou
G. Wan
S. Hou
S. Song
dcterms:description: The Apollo SourthBay dataset is designed for evaluating LiDAR localization methods, containing various urban scenes with annotated point clouds.
dcterms:title: Apollo SourthBay dataset

dcterms:description: Synthetic data generated for the study to train the line segmentation model, consisting of point clouds created from mesh primitives with added noise.
dcterms:title: Synthetic data (generated for the study)
